item.description:
Please come attend the VERY FIRST in an ongoing series of Northampton Jelly co-working days; a way cool way to get work done, meet, brainstorm, and network with other truly awesome and creative thinkers, entrepreneurs, and generally interesting and wonderful people in our far flung rural area.

What is this "Jelly" you speak of?



Jelly's a casual work event where everyone's invited. It's for anyone who'd like to work alongside other creative people in a welcoming environment.



Some Jellies are in people's homes (that's how it started), others are in coffee shops and businesses. You bring your laptop and some work, and Jelly provides wifi, a chair, and smart people to bounce ideas off of and collaborate with. There are Jellies starting all over the country, and the world. See workatjelly.com and this blog post for more background.



We are starting the Northampton Jelly on a monthly basis, on either the first or second Friday of every month.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Northampton Jelly - FIRST EVER Casual CoWorking Day
